DOC.brief_title: Use Clarithromycin Rifabutin Treatment M. Avium Complex ( MAC ) Lung Disease
DOC.criteria: Meet American Thoracic Society criterion nontuberculous mycobacterial lung disease : two AFB smear positive , culture positive sputum bronchoscopic sample and/or two AFB smear negative respiratory sample moderate heavy growth ( 2+4+ ) ; abnormal CXR consistent M. avium lung disease ; absence potential mycobacterial fungal lung pathogen ( except coexistence M. abscessus ) . Adults age 18 old Pretreatment isolate M. avium complex available MIC determination History allergy study drug If mensruating female , pregnant adequate birth control .
